an5.34:7.2.pli: “yānimāni, bhante, bhagavatā cattāri sandiṭṭhikāni dānaphalāni akkhātāni, nāhaṁ ettha bhagavato saddhāya gacchāmi; ahaṁ petāni jānāmi.
an5.34:7.2.en: “When it comes to those four [38;5;121mfruits of giving[0m that are apparent in the present life, I don’t have to rely on faith in the Buddha, for I know them too.

an5.34:7.7.pli: Yānimāni, bhante, bhagavatā cattāri sandiṭṭhikāni dānaphalāni akkhātāni, nāhaṁ ettha bhagavato saddhāya gacchāmi; ahaṁ petāni jānāmi.
an5.34:7.7.en: When it comes to these four [38;5;121mfruits of giving[0m that are apparent in the present life, I don’t have to rely on faith in the Buddha, for I know them too.
